skill.name: behaviors.skills.Attack
skill.description: For the crowd agent, to attack a given unit. The agent moves toward the unit's position and attack it. The target unit may have wounded or be dead. This skill failed if the crowd agent is under control. It is done if all the elements within the crowd has reached the target position.

link.name: moveTo
link.description: To enact the decision to reach the target unit.

link.name: attack
link.description: To enact the decision to attack the unit once it is reached.

feedback.name: failed
feedback.description: Sent if the crowd agent cannot attack the given unit because it is under control.

feedback.name: done
feedback.description: Sent once the entire crowd agent has reach the unit to attack.
